mapper.select: select uid,name,school from contestant where `group`=#{group} and zone=#{zone};
select c.uid,ds.sign_num from contestant c ,score_info ds where c.uid=ds.uid and c.`group`=#{group} and c.zone=#{zone};
select c.uid, c.name, s.name as school from contestant c ,school s where c.school=s.name and c.uid=#{uid};
